main event: A man reported seeing a strange, maneuverable object that approached the ground, briefly hovered, then accelerated rapidly and departed the area on July 20, 1966 near Rendleton, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was described as being dome-shaped and emitting a faint glow.
The object moved in an erratic manner, circling and hovering about 5 degrees above the horizon before landing and then disappearing.
The conclusion was that the sighting was possibly a balloon, though the description does not seem consistent with that.
No physical evidence such as photographs was obtained, despite the long duration of the sighting.
